statements: DELETE FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE email = 'test@example.com' AND phone_number = '+1234567890'
DELETE FROM verification_codes WHERE expiration_time < NOW();
DELETE FROM verification_codes WHERE expiration_time < NOW() AND code_id % 2 = 0;
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM tokens WHERE expiration_date < NOW()
DELETE FROM devices WHERE device_name = 'Mobile Device 1';
DELETE FROM authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 'b9d006d2-d0f4-459c-8ab3-ba6e6e00b63b' AND device_id = 'e13f9c26-77d4-4819-987a-0c03869f18f6';
